name: AFGWeaponInstantFire
comment: Copyright 2016 Coffee Stain Studios. All Rights Reserved.

methods.name: CalcWeaponFire
methods.comment: Preforms the trace to find what we hit

methods.name: ProcessInstantHit
methods.comment: Calls take damage on hit actor

methods.name: Server_NotifyHit
methods.comment: server notified of hit from client to verify

methods.name: Server_NotifyMiss
methods.comment: server notified of miss to show trail FX

methods.name: ProcessInstantHit_Confirmed
methods.comment: continue processing the instant hit, as if it has been confirmed by the server

methods.name: ShouldDealDamage
methods.comment: check if weapon should deal damage to actor

methods.name: PlayImpactEffect
methods.comment: Plays the impact effect at the impact location

properties.name: mWeaponTraceLength
properties.comment: How far we should trace for the weapon

properties.name: mHitParticleEffect
properties.comment: The particle to use when hitting the ground
